Subject: SEEK scans are taking a long time
Description:
Some scans are taking 70-80-90 hours. 
Looking for improvements that we could review with Netwrix and any recommendations
What_We_Know__c:
+++++
2025_0205 @ 03:19:27 PM EST - MEETING FINDINGS
+++++
1) DFSFP01 - now processing takes 2 hours 37 minutes - used to be as high 114 hours - last one was 105 hours

+++++
Customer has 16 processors and 48 GB of memory
+++++
1) Job Properties > Performance tab - change to 4 threads

2) NEA > FSSA Data Collector Wizard > Sensitive Data Settings STEP > Performance Options > Number of SDD Scan processes > changed from 2 to 5

3) Turned off DEBUG (logging) for the job.
+++++
Solution_Comment__c:
+++++
Customer has 16 processors and 48 GB of memory
+++++
1) Job Properties > Performance tab - changed to 4 threads

2) NEA > FSSA Data Collector Wizard > Sensitive Data Settings STEP > Performance Options > Number of SDD Scan processes > changed from 2 to 5

3) Turned off DEBUG (logging) for the job.
